text: The following are the football (soccer) events in the year 2025 around the world. ==Events== ===January=== * January 7: French national team manager and 2018 FIFA World Cup winner Didier Deschamps announced he will leave when his contract expires after the 2026 FIFA World Cup. * January 22: Turkish manager Nuri Sahin is fired at Borussia Dortmund. * January 24: ** French manager Rudi Garcia was announced as the head coach for the Belgium national football team, replacing Domenico Tedesco. ** Argentina's U-20 national team beat Brazil U-20s 6–0 at the 2025 South American U-20 Championship. This is the largest defeat ever for the Brazil Under-20 national team. * January 31: Colombian footballer Jhon Duran signs for Al Nassr for £71 million (€85 million). This is currently the most expensive transfer of 2025. ===March=== * March 20: Japan are the first country to qualify for the 2026 FIFA World Cup. * March 21: Mexican club Club Leon are removed from the 2025 FIFA Club World Cup. This is because the club broke FIFA's rules on multi-club ownership, because they are owned by Grupo Pachuca, who also own CF Pachuca. ===April=== * April 27: Liverpool win their 2nd Premier League title and 20th English league title. This means they are now tied with rivals Manchester United for the most English league titles. ===May=== * May 12: Carlo Ancelotti announces he will be the new manager of the Brazilian national team on May 26. He will be the fourth foreign manager to coach Brazil and the first since Filpo Núñez in 1965. ===2026 FIFA World Cup qualification=== * March 20: * March 24: * March 25: , ==Men's tournament
